Segment.name: RMR
Segment.comment: To specify the accounts receivable open item(s) to be included in the cash application and to convey the appropriate detail

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: PaymentActionCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the accounts receivable open item(s), if any, to be included in the cash application.

Field.name: AdjustmentReasonCode
Field.comment: Code indicating reason for debit or credit memo or adjustment to invoice, debit or credit memo, or payment

SyntaxNote.name: P0102
SyntaxNote.comment: If either RMR01 or RMR02 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P0708
SyntaxNote.comment: If either RMR07 or RMR08 is present, then the other is required.
